short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tool for automatically migrating Yugioh decklists from DuelingBook/EDOPro to tournament registration websites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of crafting a Yugioh deck to play for a tournament on a simulator, only to manually enter the same decklist again through a clunky form on the tournament registration website? Accidentally entered a high stakes event with an extra "Bahamut Shark", or "Branded Loss" instead of "Branded Lost"? This is the tool for you!

The Decklist Auto-Filler extension takes a YDKE deck string from popular Yugioh simulators like DuelingBook and EDOPro, and automatically fills out your decklist form on registration websites for you! Simply click "Auto-Fill", and refresh the page when prompted!

Works for all cards currently released in the Yugioh TCG, and is kept up to date following new card releases.

## CHANGELOG ##
**Version 1.0.0**
- UI overhaul!
- Added "Feedback" button.
- Extension popup now displays the latest available card set.
- Extension popup displays extension version number, and links to Chrome Web Store page if update is available.

**Version 0.2.0**
- Added Auto-Fill progress indicator.
- Fixed bug that caused "Welcome" page to open on startup.

**Version 0.1.0**
- Initial Release.
